parameters.name: Locked
parameters.description:
The lock status of the template group. Valid values:

*   **Enabled**: The template group is locked.
*   **Disabled**: The template group is not locked.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description:
The name of the transcoding template group.

*   The name can be up to 128 bytes in length.
*   The value must be encoded in UTF-8.

parameters.name: TranscodeTemplateGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the transcoding template group.

parameters.name: TranscodeTemplateList
parameters.description: The configurations of the transcoding template. The value is a JSON-formatted string. For more information about the data structure, see the "TranscodeTemplate" section of the [Basic data types](~~52839~~) topic.
